title: HDClone 6.0.5 Enterprise Edition Portable + Boot Image
description:
*** About this release

Language: English
License type: Volume License
Running HD Clone: unpack and simply run HDClone
Creating boot media: create USB / other bootable media using Rufus 2.8 portable and ISO boot image (both incuded)

*** About HDClone

HDClone creates physical or logical copies (clones) and file images of hard disks and other mass storage media.
HDClone is a perfect tool for backups and creating copies of entire software or operating system installations.

A special SafeRescue mode makes HDClone an invaluable tool for rescuing defective hard disks and other media.
HDClone works independent of partitioning scheme, file system, and operating system.
It also works with proprietary formats which would otherwise be inaccessible.

*** Features of HDClone 6 Enterprise Edition

- New: Reworked CopyEngine
- New: Differential images
- New: Copy dynamic disks
- New: Restore images with changes applied
- Intel Software RAID support
- Unlock ATA passwords
- Accelerated SSDs via TRIM
- Advanced Format drive cloning & backup
- PartitionSelect
- New: Boot from SecureBoot and with Bluetooth mice/keyboards
- Self-booting and under Windows
- QuickCompress â€“ fast image compression
- Password protected and ecrypted (AES) images
- UEFI and GPT support
- Miray Virtual Disk: write to virtual drives (also VHDX/VDI)
- New: SmartCopy, up-/downsizing and defrag for HFS+
- SmartCopy: logical copies
- SafeRescue mode for data recovery
- Automatic upsizing of NTFS, FAT and ext2/3/4 partitions
- Automatic reducing of NTFS and FAT partitions
- Defrag on the fly for NTFS and FAT
- Command line interface (CLI)
- HotCopy & LiveImage during Windows operation

Homepage https://www.miray.de/products/applications/hdclone6.html
Technical data https://www.miray.de/products/applications/hdclone6/enterprise-edition.html?tab908=2#tab-panel-908
VirusTotal report https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/c18d855d4476af9d7e84e8b4af4c7182b2219e217c1bcd4bec125fbc14faac9b/analysis/1461664330/
